item.title: A collection of analog black and white photography.
item.description: Jonathan Evans, Washington, D.C., 2018. Ashley and Phil, Wheaton, MD, 2017. Gran and Grandson, Sun City Center, FL, 2017. Dean and Cathy, Davidson, NC, 2017. Anniversary, Hot Springs, NC, 2017. Arjan Neng, Bangkok, 2017. Family Photoshoot Fail, Wheaton, MD, 2017. All Action, Anna Maria, FL, 2018. Bronson-Watkins Family, Anna Maria, FL, 2018. Inspector Matt, Hollywood, AL, 2018. Not All Who Wander Are Lost, Bradenton, FL, 2018.

item.title: Distancing
item.description: A photoseries of our life in Thailand during the COVID-19 pandemic of 2020. March 8, 2020, Chatting with Gran. March 20, 2020, On Nut, Thailand. March 21, 2020, Daily outdoor play. March 21, 2020, Walking home after eating at a restaurant the evening before partial lockdown begins. April 3, 2020, First checkmate. April 4, 2020. April 5, 2020. April 6, 2020. April 7, 2020. April 8, 2020, Typical daily ice cream eating session.

item.title: Recent wanderings
item.description: Chitwan in Southern Nepal Around the lodge Views from Sapana Village Lodge, Sauraha, Chitwan. A fisherman casts his net in the distance. One of many of Bob’s buddies. Navigating between different stretches of the Budhi Rapti River. No fish caught, but plenty of fun. River fishing continues as Mahout bathes elephant in background. Around the village of Sauraha The Tharu people are an ethnic group indigenous to the Terai in southern Nepal and northern India.
